languages.text: "И все-таки на твоем флагмане тесно и невыносимо скучно". {n}Винтерскейл смотрит вам в глаза и улыбается почти добродушно.{/n} "Будешь откладывать охоту со мной — я устрою ее на одной из палуб. Развею скуку, так сказать".

traits.locale_text: "И все-таки на твоем флагмане тесно и невыносимо скучно". {n}Винтерскейл смотрит вам в глаза и улыбается почти добродушно.{/n} "Будешь откладывать охоту со мной — я устрою ее на одной из палуб. Развею скуку, так сказать".

languages.text: "And yet your flagship is cramped and unbearably dull." {n}Winterscale looks you in the eye and flashes an almost good-natured smile.{/n} "If you keep delaying your hunt with me, I will have to hold it on one of the decks. To relieve my boredom, so to speak."
languages.original_text: "И все-таки на твоем флагмане тесно и невыносимо скучно". {n}Винтерскейл смотрит вам в глаза и улыбается почти добродушно.{/n} "Будешь откладывать охоту со мной — я устрою ее на одной из палуб. Развею скуку, так сказать".

traits.locale_text: "And yet your flagship is cramped and unbearably dull." {n}Winterscale looks you in the eye and flashes an almost good-natured smile.{/n} "If you keep postponing the hunt with me, I will set it up on one of the decks. Relieve the boredom, so to say."

"And yet your flagship is cramped and unbearably dull." {n}Winterscale looks you in the eye and flashes an almost good-natured smile.{/n} "If you keep postponing the hunt with me, I will set it up on one of the decks. Relieve the boredom, so to say."

"And yet your flagship is cramped and unbearably dull." {n}Winterscale looks you in the eye and flashes an almost good-natured smile.{/n} "If you keep postponing the hunt with me, I will organize it on one of the decks. Relieve the boredom, so to speak."

"And yet your flagship is cramped and unbearably dull." {n}Winterscale looks you in the eye and flashes an almost good-natured smile.{/n} "If you keep postponing the hunt with me, I will organize it on one of the decks. Relieve the boredom, so to speak."

"And yet your flagship is cramped and unbearably dull." {n}Winterscale looks you in the eye and flashes an almost good-natured smile.{/n} "If you keep delaying your hunt with me, I will have to hold it on one of the decks. To relieve my boredom, so to speak."

"And yet your flagship is cramped and unbearably dull." {n}Winterscale looks you in the eye and flashes an almost good-natured smile.{/n} "If you keep delaying your hunt with me, I will have to hold it on one of the decks. To relieve my boredom, so to speak."

languages.text: «Y, sin embargo, tu nave insignia está abarrotada y es tediosa». {n}Winterscale te mira y te lanza una sonrisa casi amistosa.{/n} «Como sigas retrasando la caza, tendré que organizar otra en cubierta. Para aliviar el aburrimiento, ya sabes».
languages.original_text: "And yet your flagship is cramped and unbearably dull." {n}Winterscale looks you in the eye and flashes an almost good-natured smile.{/n} "If you keep delaying your hunt with me, I will have to hold it on one of the decks. To relieve my boredom, so to speak."

traits.locale_text: «Y, sin embargo, tu nave insignia está abarrotada y es tediosa». {n}Winterscale te mira y te lanza una sonrisa casi amistosa.{/n} «Como sigas posponiendo la caza, tendré que organizar otra en cubierta. Para aliviar el aburrimiento, ya sabes».

languages.text: « Mais votre vaisseau amiral est étriqué et insoutenablement ennuyeux. » {n}Winterscale vous regarde droit dans les yeux et vous décoche un sourire presque enjoué.{/n} « Si vous n'arrêtez pas de remettre votre chasse à plus tard, je serai obligé de l'organiser sur l'un des ponts. Afin de tromper l'ennui, pour ainsi dire. »
languages.original_text: "And yet your flagship is cramped and unbearably dull." {n}Winterscale looks you in the eye and flashes an almost good-natured smile.{/n} "If you keep delaying your hunt with me, I will have to hold it on one of the decks. To relieve my boredom, so to speak."

traits.locale_text: « Mais votre vaisseau amiral est étriqué et insoutenablement ennuyeux. » {n}Winterscale vous regarde droit dans les yeux et vous décoche un sourire presque enjoué.{/n} « Si vous n'arrêtez pas de remettre notre chasse à plus tard, je l'organiserai sur l'un des ponts. Pour tromper l'ennui, dira-t-on. »

languages.text: 「お前の旗艦は窮屈だし、我慢できんほど退屈だな」{n}ウィンタースケールはあなたの目を見て、温厚にすら見える笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「お前が俺との狩りを延期し続けるなら、デッキの上でやってやる。いわゆる退屈しのぎってやつだ」
languages.original_text: "And yet your flagship is cramped and unbearably dull." {n}Winterscale looks you in the eye and flashes an almost good-natured smile.{/n} "If you keep delaying your hunt with me, I will have to hold it on one of the decks. To relieve my boredom, so to speak."

traits.locale_text: 「お前の旗艦は窮屈だし、我慢できんほど退屈だな」{n}ウィンタースケールはあなたの目を見て、温厚にすら見える笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「お前が俺との狩りを延期し続けるなら、デッキの上でやってやる。いわゆる退屈しのぎってやつだ」

languages.text: “不过，你的旗舰真的是又窄又闷。”{n}温特斯凯尔看着你的眼睛，脸上露出了近乎善意的微笑。{/n}“如果这场狩猎继续推迟下去的话，我就不得不去某块甲板上组织狩猎了。这么说吧，我打算缓解一下无聊。”
languages.original_text: "And yet your flagship is cramped and unbearably dull." {n}Winterscale looks you in the eye and flashes an almost good-natured smile.{/n} "If you keep delaying your hunt with me, I will have to hold it on one of the decks. To relieve my boredom, so to speak."

traits.locale_text: “不过，你的旗舰真的是又窄又闷。”{n}温特斯凯尔看着你的眼睛，脸上露出了近乎善意的微笑。{/n}“如果这场狩猎继续推迟下去的话，我就准备去某块甲板上组织狩猎了。这么说吧，我打算缓解一下无聊。”

languages.text: "Und doch ist Euer Flaggschiff beengt und unerträglich öde." {n}Winterzunder sieht dir direkt in die Augen und grinst fast gutmütig.{/n} "Wenn Ihr die Jagd mit mir weiter aufschiebt, halte ich sie bald auf einem der Decks ab. Um etwas gegen die Langeweile zu tun."
languages.original_text: "And yet your flagship is cramped and unbearably dull." {n}Winterscale looks you in the eye and flashes an almost good-natured smile.{/n} "If you keep delaying your hunt with me, I will have to hold it on one of the decks. To relieve my boredom, so to speak."

traits.locale_text: "Und doch ist Euer Flaggschiff beengt und unerträglich öde." {n}Winterzunder sieht dir direkt in die Augen und grinst fast gutmütig.{/n} "Wenn Ihr die Jagd mit mir weiter aufschiebt, organisiere ich sie bald auf einem der Decks. Um etwas gegen die Langeweile zu tun."

languages.text: "Yine de sancak gemin çok sıkışık ve katlanılmaz derecede yavan." {n}Winterscale, gözlerinin içine bakıyor ve çok iyi yürekli bir tabiata sahip birinden gelebilecek bir şekilde gülümsüyor.{/n} "Eğer birlikte çıkacağımız avı ertelemeyi sürdürürsen güvertelerin birinde ava çıkmak zorunda kalırım. Tabiri caizse sıkıntımı gidermem gerek."
languages.original_text: "And yet your flagship is cramped and unbearably dull." {n}Winterscale looks you in the eye and flashes an almost good-natured smile.{/n} "If you keep delaying your hunt with me, I will have to hold it on one of the decks. To relieve my boredom, so to speak."
